pages.text: This $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() rots the mind... it will cause the affected target to see monsters which do not exist.$(br2)It will not be able to attack them; however this does not apply to the visions.
This is a $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Greater Curse$(); it is slightly harder to get rid of.
